name: html
description: The base tag of an HTML page.

name: head
description: A tag containing information about the page.

name: body
description: The tag containing all the page content.

name: h2
description: A tag for title less important that 'h1' ones.

name: a
description: A tag to link other page.

name: script
description: A tag to import and execute Ja&vScript scripts.

name: form
description: A tag containing a form to be completed..
